headline: Trucker Path Announces Winner of $10,200+ Prize Package in National Truck Driver Appreciation Sweepstakes
summary: Trucker Path, the most comprehensive and relied-upon mobile app for North American truckers, today announced that it has selected the winner of the fourth annual National Truck Driver Appreciation Sweepstakes (NTDAS) on behalf of its sponsor partners. The winner, chosen from entries submitted by drivers across the country, will receive over $10,000 in prizes intended to make life on the road more comfortable and rewarding.

headline: Indian Oil Major Expects Oil Prices to Hold Steady Between $60 and $65
summary: India’s ONGC expects oil prices to stay between $60 and $65 per barrel and plans to boost production and profitability without government aid or layoffs.

headline: Will Texas Supply Disruptions and Water Risks Change Exxon Mobil's (XOM) Resilience Narrative?
summary: In the past week, Exxon Mobil faced operational disruptions including a brief shutdown at its Beaumont, Texas refinery and growing concerns over drought-induced water shortages in Corpus Christi, threatening industrial production and supply reliability. This convergence of operational challenges brings investor focus to Exxon Mobil's resilience in managing critical supply chain and resource risks across its global operations. We'll examine how recent supply-chain risks, particularly...
